What idiot told you that?


"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5320b8aa6368725c1f190000#post_5320b8aa6368725c1f190000

Thankfully, that's not the way my school works.

It's rather common for that "snowball effect" to occur, but most teachers in my school will boost up your average merely for _trying,_ even if your grades are shit. Guess I'm just lucky.

I mean, I have a ninety five average in an advanced Lit class and my mother doesn't think I know to write a _thesis statement?_

...

"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5320bd0f63687251cd340000#post_5320bd0f63687251cd340000

I believe the concept of thesis is the cause here. A _thesis_ for (some) of us means a statement with scientific value meant to cause a controversy about a certain topic and promote a discussion about it... Don't know if over there there's another definition for it.

i only watch the show so i can keep up with the fandom images n shit.

i no longer enjoy it as much as before, like when i watch a new episode of hannibal or rock and mirty.

hell, sometimes i spent an entire week before wathcing an episode (i havent even watched pinkie apple pie)
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5320bd6b6368726c9d450000#post_5320bd6b6368726c9d450000
The thing that loonies in fandoms should realize is that if you alienate everyone that isn't jumping for joy at every second of a franchise's medium that would kill the entire fandom.  It would just be a bunch of people on the internet complaining about how everyone left them and no one remembers them.

I.e. what happened with mass effect 3 and how it alienated every last person on the planet cause the reaction was, "well if you don't like it just leave" and then everyone started leaving like they suggested.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

He had _all_ the information right there in front of him, but he wasn't convinced. Obviously the words of an estonian doctor trained in the soviet union can't be trusted. Because commies.

Thankfully i don't have to see him again. It was just a quick one-time visit.

topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5320c0346368726106080000#post_5320c0346368726106080000
The reason he wasn't convinced was because the MRI scan i had to undergo didn't turn up anything and the neurologist said that they didn't discover any clear neurological reason for my disorder _with that scan._ 

Which the muppet-doctor thought meant that there was no neurological reason for it whatsoever in existence. And since no psychological reason was discovered either, it must mean that i'm faking it.

"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5320c4e563687242bf9a0000#post_5320c4e563687242bf9a0000
DSPD, Delayed Sleep Phase Disorder. My sleep patterns are completely random. I sleep when i happen to sleep, and it's next to impossible to maintain a steady sleep schedule.
